forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 5am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 59, with temperatures rising to around 61 overnight. North northeast wind around 2 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers. Partly sunny, with a high near 77. East northeast wind 2 to 7 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. East northeast wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 2pm and 5pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 76. East wind 5 to 9 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
